articles.description: Scientists are racing to produce a coronavirus vaccine in what is something of a challenge to the anti-vaccine movement. But the virus has also done something more startling. It has made some anti-vaxxers change their minds.

articles.title: California reports first state inmate death tied to coronavirus; patient had been incarcerated in Chino - Inland Valley Daily Bulletin
articles.description: Statewide, 115 incarcerated persons and 88 prison system employees have tested positive for the virus.
articles.content:
California corrections officials announced Sunday the first prison inmate death from complications related to COVID-19.
